commit.message: Update rustdoc search test to check `!`

files.patch:
@@ -35,6 +35,8 @@ const QUERY = [
     "a,:",
     "  a<>  :",
     "mod : :",
+    "a!a",
+    "a!!",
 ];
 
 const PARSED = [
@@ -362,4 +364,22 @@ const PARSED = [
         userQuery: "mod : :",
         error: 'Unexpected `:`',
     },
+    {
+        elems: [],
+        foundElems: 0,
+        original: "a!a",
+        returned: [],
+        typeFilter: -1,
+        userQuery: "a!a",
+        error: '`!` can only be at the end of an ident',
+    },
+    {
+        elems: [],
+        foundElems: 0,
+        original: "a!!",
+        returned: [],
+        typeFilter: -1,
+        userQuery: "a!!",
+        error: 'Cannot have more than one `!` in an ident',
+    },
 ];

@@ -0,0 +1,93 @@
+const QUERY = [
+    "R<!>",
+    "!",
+    "a!",
+    "a!::b",
+    "a!::b!",
+];
+
+const PARSED = [
+    {
+        elems: [{
+            name: "r",
+            fullPath: ["r"],
+            pathWithoutLast: [],
+            pathLast: "r",
+            generics: [

+                    name: "!",
+                    fullPath: ["!"],
+                    pathWithoutLast: [],
+                    pathLast: "!",
+                    generics: [],
+                },

+];
